refbody.section: PurposeSet disk persistence as enabled or disabled on an appliance.

ul.li: If you want to change the value of EnableDiskPersistence, the CleanStore parameter must be included in the command. If the CleanStore parameter is not included, then the command fails.
The command must be capitalized as shown.
The default value for is True.
The default value for an physical appliance is False.
Changing the value to True on a physical appliance has a negative impact on performance.

refbody.section: ExampleSets the disk persistence on an appliance from True to False: imaserver get EnableDiskPersistence EnableDiskPersistence=True imaserver set EnableDiskPersistence=False CleanStore The requested configuration change has completed successfully.
